LanguageData.VA_Lore_PodOrigin: Fragments of a pre-crash dataslate describe "Virtu-Awake" as a rehabilitation tool for combat shock. After the fall, survivors stripped the safety rails and rewrote the memory palettes.
LanguageData.VA_Lore_GlitchLog01: Audio bleed: whispers in maintenance mode say "wake up" in three voices. Technicians taped over the speaker instead of fixing the bug.
LanguageData.VA_Lore_GlitchLog02: Server note: Render cluster rejected 17 reality-check pings. Safeguard failed open. Users reported "seeing the debug grid".
LanguageData.VA_Lore_GlitchLog03: Thermal dump shows impossible heat spikes when users feel guilty. Engineers called it "penance feedback" and declined to patch.
LanguageData.VA_Lore_AncientMsg01: Hidden string in pod firmware: "If you read this, your world is a branch. Grow strange." Signed only with a stylized eye.
LanguageData.VA_Lore_AncientMsg02: Maintenance QR decodes to a prayer: "May the sleepers dream gently, may the seams hold, may the watchers blink last."
LanguageData.VA_Lore_Prophecy: Sim theory fragment: "Every glitch is an eyelid. When they all close, we will be blinking on the outside."
